function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Vulnerabilities in social and economic models for conservation activities due to pandemic","Impact":"Sudden loss of revenue and livelihoods, economic blow, escalating food security concerns, major human health crises","Mitigation":"Developing alternative revenue sources, diversifying local supply chains, strengthening social welfare schemes, and addressing societal safety nets","Technologies":"Remote monitoring and research technologies, sustainable supply chain management tools","People":"Communities reliant on international tourism, vulnerable human communities","Owner":"Government, public engagement, conservation organizations, local partnerships, and leadership"}]}
